alert.note: Alert for Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 12 at 1:05PM MDT until June 16 at 3:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Colorado... Arkansas River NEAR Avondale affecting Pueblo County. For the Lower Arkansas River...including Pueblo, Avondale, Nepesta, Fowler, Rocky Ford, La Junta, Lamar...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Arkansas River NEAR Avondale. * WHEN...From this evening to early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Moderate Flood * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:45 PM MDT Monday the stage was 6.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 8.4 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 8.4 feet on 07/10/2006. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 115 AM MDT.
